IF(NOT ANDROID)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()

IF(NOT EXISTS "C:/Program Files/Android/Android Studio/bin/studio.exe")
	DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	DKDOWNLOAD(${DKONLINE}/Tools/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-windows.exe)
	DKSETPATH(C:/)
	DKSET(QUEUE_BUILD ON)
	ANDROID_COMMAND(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-studio-ide-173.4670197-windows.exe)
ENDIF()
